charges.charge_description: Count 2: 21:846, 21:841(a)(1), and 21:841(b)(1)(A): Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine and less than 50 kilograms of marihuana(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: 90 Months BOP; 5 years SRT with supervision. $100.00 S/A fee due instanter; fine waived.

charges.charge_description: CT. 1: Conspiracy to posses with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine and less than 50 kilograms of marihuana; 21 USC 846, 841(a)(1), and 841(b)(1)(A)(1)
Count 1: 21:846, 21:841(a)(1), and 21:841(b)(1)(B): Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 100 kilograms of marihuana(1s)
CT. 2: Possession with intent to distribute less than 50 kilograms, that is, approx 22 kilos (48.4 lbs) of marihuana; 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(D) and 18 USC 2.(2)
CT. 3:Possession with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine. that is, approx. 473 grams (1.5 pounds), of methamphetamine; 21 USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A) and 18 USC 2.(3)
Count 3: 21:841(a)(1), 21:841(b)(1)(D), and 18:2: Possession with intent to distribute less than 50 kilograms, that is approx. 22 kilos (48.4 lbs) of marijuana(3s)
Count 4: 21:841(a)(1), 21:841(b)(1)(A), and 18:2: Possession with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine, that is approx. 473 grams (1.05 pounds) of methamphetamine(4s)
Count 1: 21:846, 21:841(a)(1), and 21:841(b)(1)(B): Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 100 kilograms of marihuana(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: 58 Months BOP; 4 years SRT w/o supervision. $100.00 S/A fee remitted; fine waived.

charges.charge_description: Count 1: 21:846, 21:841(a)(1), and 21:841(b)(1)(A): Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine and less than 50 kilograms of marijuana(1)
Count 2: 21:841(a)(1), 21:841(b)(1)(D), and 18:2: Possession with intent to distribute lss than 50 kilograms, that is, approx. 22 kilos (48.4 lbs) of marihuana(2)

Count 3: 21:841(a)(1), 21:841(b)(1)(A), and 18:2: Possession with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine, that is, approx. 473 grams (1.05 pounds) of methamphetamine(3)
Count 3: 21:841(a)(1), 21:841(b)(1)(D), and 18:2: Possession with intent to distribute less than 50 kilograms, that is approx. 22 kilos (48.4 lbs) of marijuana(3s)
Count 4: 21:841(a)(1), 21:841(b)(1)(A), and 18:2: Possession with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine, that is approx. 473 grams (1.05 pounds) of methamphetamine(4s)

21:846=CD.F, 21:841A=CD.F; Knowingly and intentionally combine, conspire and agree with others to possess with intent to distribute approximately .473 kilograms of methemphetamine and 22.05 kilograms of marijuana.
Count 2: 21:846, 21:841(a)(1), and 21:841(b)(1)(A): Conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute more than 50 grams of methamphetamine and less than 50 kilograms of marihuana(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: 58 Months BOP; 3 years SRT with supervision. $100.00 S/A fee due instanter; fine waived.
